name: Polaroid
description: High school loner Bird Fitcher has no idea what dark secrets are tied to the Polaroid camera she finds. It doesn't take long to discover that those who have their picture taken with it, soon die.

review.author: stevelomas-69401
review.heading: What's next, a haunted toilet seat?
review.reviewBody: Absolutely scrapping the bottom of the barrel in the haunted object subgenre. It's more terrifying that the producers think Polaroids are antique than anything in the film. Massive inconsistencies, huge plot holes and by the book acting make this one to miss.

keywords: teenage girl,female photographer,female protagonist,teenage protagonist,introverted protagonist
